name: Fault-Tolerant Workstation Cluster
author: Yuliya Butkova <butkova@depend.uni-saarland.de>
description: The workstation cluster consists of two sides of `NÂ´ workstations which are connected via a backbone. The components of the system can fail and need to be repaired in this case. The model has been developed in [0] and described and used in [1] and [2].

properties.name: ReachMin
properties.description: The minimum probability that all left workstations or the left switch are down and similar for the right side.

properties.name: TimeMin
properties.description: The minimum time until all left workstations or the left switch are down and similar for the right side.

properties.name: TimeMax
properties.description: The maximum time until all left workstations or the left switch are down and similar for the right side.
